wp_rem_cs_icon_box_content_align="top-center" wp_rem_cs_var_icon_box_column="3" ][icon_boxes_item wp_rem_cs_var_icon_box_title="Draw On Map" wp_rem_cs_var_link_url="#" wp_rem_cs_var_icon_box_icon_type="image" wp_rem_cs_var_icon_box_image="http://homevillas.chimpgroup.com/home-v2/wp-content/uploads/price-plan-icons-1.png" ]In Home Villa theme search, user can manually draw lines on map, all ads property listings in that area show up as a result.[/icon_boxes_item][icon_boxes_item wp_rem_cs_var_icon_box_title=" Shedule Viewing" wp_rem_cs_var_link_url="#" wp_rem_cs_var_icon_box_icon_type="image" wp_rem_cs_var_icon_box_image="http://homevillas.chimpgroup.com/home-v2/wp-content/uploads/price-plan-icons-2.png" ]User can schedule a viewing date and time for property with agent as per convenience. Agent can respond the schedule as per choice.Â 
[/icon_boxes_item][icon_boxes_item wp_rem_cs_var_icon_box_title=" Seo Friendly" wp_rem_cs_var_link_url="#" wp_rem_cs_var_icon_box_icon_type="image" wp_rem_cs_var_icon_box_image="http://homevillas.chimpgroup.com/home-v2/wp-content/uploads/price-plan-icons-3.png" ]Home Villa built for the best SEO practices. All links and elements are SEO friendly, yet putting your site high in ranks[/icon_boxes_item][icon_boxes_item wp_rem_cs_var_icon_box_title=" Open House Filteration" wp_rem_cs_var_icon_box_icon_type="image" wp_rem_cs_var_icon_box_image="http://homevillas.chimpgroup.com/home-v2/wp-content/uploads/price-plan-icons-4.png" ]User can filter houses / properties on the basis of open time and dates for viewing. See the houses which suit your time.Â 
[/icon_boxes_item][icon_boxes_item wp_rem_cs_var_icon_box_title="Team Management" wp_rem_cs_var_link_url="#" wp_rem_cs_var_icon_box_icon_type="image" wp_rem_cs_var_icon_box_image="http://homevillas.chimpgroup.com/home-v2/wp-content/uploads/price-plan-icons-5.png" ]With Home Villa Theme Team management , add members, their profile, contact details and

much more.";i:5;s:111:"Home Villa provides mortgage calculator that Calculate your monthly mortgage payment using the free calculator.";}

a:3:{i:0;s:334:"The basic idea for those buying and selling real estate is usually to purchase a property that is undervalued and then sell it at a higher price, possibly after some improvements are done to the property. Ornare sagittis ante erat nec ultricies amet aenean netus sodales at, amet vehicula quis vel platea mattis vel felis hendrerit ad, at rhoncus tortor habitasse venenatis etiam senectus erat sit varius proin ligula lectus mi accumsan curabitur orci varius justo nec elit. Neque massa ut ad arcu iaculis, malesuada feugiat maecenas enim curabitur, nisi hac augue orci ut vulputate commodo consequat iaculis etiam enim porta eros, pharetra erat aptent nibh pretium volutpat quisque, mi suspendisse tristique neque quisque convallis tempus. Vulputate quam a auctor habitant pharetra cubilia id posuere blandit ut varius suscipit sed blandit, class semper maecenas sodales ut feugiat congue curae vivamus faucibus dictum tempor facilisis ad eget amet pulvinar vehicula curae ipsum nostra potenti, sociosqu torquent accumsan rutrum sit orci. item.title: we'll bring you the best in real estate news
item.dc:creator: homevillas-admin
item.content:encoded:
Integer mattis magna volutpat euismod habitant mi faucibus elementum proin mi, lobortis iaculis dolor torquent pellentesque vitae quisque posuere mattis, sit non felis accumsan molestie hac tempor interdum ut sagittis eu donec placerat pulvinar nibh porttitor euismod arcu, lacinia non netus praesent fames velit conubia, mattis taciti mollis a quisque inceptos nisi.
Donec luctus lacinia sem potenti aptent est platea, orci tortor dui fringilla curae varius tempor, rhoncus commodo sapien auctor himenaeos laoreet maecenas tempor venenatis accumsan lacinia congue dolor laoreet, ut nostra nulla nunc aptent dolor quisque, lorem sociosqu nunc convallis curabitur faucibus.
Ornare sagittis ante erat nec ultricies amet aenean netus sodales at, amet vehicula quis vel platea mattis vel felis hendrerit ad, at rhoncus tortor habitasse venenatis etiam senectus erat sit varius proin ligula lectus mi accumsan curabitur orci varius justo nec elit.
Neque massa ut ad arcu iaculis, malesuada feugiat maecenas enim curabitur, nisi hac augue orci ut vulputate commodo consequat iaculis etiam enim porta eros, pharetra erat aptent nibh pretium volutpat quisque, mi suspendisse tristique neque quisque convallis tempus.
Vulputate quam a auctor habitant pharetra cubilia id posuere blandit ut varius suscipit sed blandit, class semper maecenas sodales ut feugiat congue curae vivamus faucibus dictum tempor facilisis ad eget amet pulvinar vehicula curae ipsum nostra potenti, sociosqu torquent accumsan rutrum sit orci.
Donec luctus lacinia sem potenti aptent est platea, orci tortor dui fringilla curae varius tempor, rhoncus commodo sapien auctor himenaeos laoreet maecenas tempor venenatis accumsan lacinia congue dolor laoreet, ut nostra nulla nunc aptent dolor quisque, lorem sociosqu nunc convallis curabitur faucibus.
Convallis vehicula justo urna mauris etiam sapien egestas metus vehicula netus, donec vivamus orci amet hendrerit molestie nunc facilisis sit pulvinar vivamus, porta gravida quisque tristique inceptos nibh a purus ut.
Justo vitae curabitur rhoncus per nullam enim magna vulputate luctus nostra, enim aliquam libero vestibulum orci dapibus risus eu blandit, nisi per est ligula neque tincidunt dictum ornare vehicula.

item.title: the leader in real estate information systems
item.dc:creator: homevillas-admin
item.content:encoded:
Integer mattis magna volutpat euismod habitant mi faucibus elementum proin mi, lobortis iaculis dolor torquent pellentesque vitae quisque posuere mattis, sit non felis accumsan molestie hac tempor interdum ut sagittis eu donec placerat pulvinar nibh porttitor euismod arcu, lacinia non netus praesent fames velit conubia, mattis taciti mollis a quisque inceptos nisi.
Donec luctus lacinia sem potenti aptent est platea, orci tortor dui fringilla curae varius tempor, rhoncus commodo sapien auctor himenaeos laoreet maecenas tempor venenatis accumsan lacinia congue dolor laoreet, ut nostra nulla nunc aptent dolor quisque, lorem sociosqu nunc convallis curabitur faucibus.
Ornare sagittis ante erat nec ultricies amet aenean netus sodales at, amet vehicula quis vel platea mattis vel felis hendrerit ad, at rhoncus tortor habitasse venenatis etiam senectus erat sit varius proin ligula lectus mi accumsan curabitur orci varius justo nec elit.
Neque massa ut ad arcu iaculis, malesuada feugiat maecenas enim curabitur, nisi hac augue orci ut vulputate commodo consequat iaculis etiam enim porta eros, pharetra erat aptent nibh pretium volutpat quisque, mi suspendisse tristique neque quisque convallis tempus.
Vulputate quam a auctor habitant pharetra cubilia id posuere blandit ut varius suscipit sed blandit, class semper maecenas sodales ut feugiat congue curae vivamus faucibus dictum tempor facilisis ad eget amet pulvinar vehicula curae ipsum nostra potenti, sociosqu torquent accumsan rutrum sit orci.
Donec luctus lacinia sem potenti aptent est platea, orci tortor dui fringilla curae varius tempor, rhoncus commodo sapien auctor himenaeos laoreet maecenas tempor venenatis accumsan lacinia congue dolor laoreet, ut nostra nulla nunc aptent dolor quisque, lorem sociosqu nunc convallis curabitur faucibus.
Convallis vehicula justo urna mauris etiam sapien egestas metus vehicula netus, donec vivamus orci amet hendrerit molestie nunc facilisis sit pulvinar vivamus, porta gravida quisque tristique inceptos nibh a purus ut.
Justo vitae curabitur rhoncus per nullam enim magna vulputate luctus nostra, enim aliquam libero vestibulum orci dapibus risus eu blandit, nisi per est ligula neque tincidunt dictum ornare vehicula.
